main.name: Kumari Anushka
main.description: Passionate about building impactful web applications with React.
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Kumari Anushka, a dedicated Software Engineer with a strong background in frontend development. Currently, I am a Lead Frontend Developer at Assiduus Global Inc., where I specialize in creating dynamic and user-friendly web applications using modern technologies like React, Redux, and Webpack. I have also worked as a Senior Frontend Developer at MyDash, contributing to various large-scale projects. My journey began with a gold medal in BCA, where I developed a passion for coding and a drive to help others succeed in their careers. I'm constantly learning and exploring new technologies, and I'm eager to make a positive impact in the tech world.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to connect or collaborate!

education.description: Pursuing MCA with a focus on software development and advanced computer science concepts.
Graduated with a Gold Medal and a Merit Scholarship.

work.title: Lead Frontend Developer
work.description: Leading the development of scalable and user-friendly web applications using React, Redux, and Webpack.

work.title: Senior Frontend Developer
work.description: Developed and maintained complex web applications, ensuring optimal performance and usability.

testimonials.text: Anushka's skills in React and frontend development are truly impressive. She brings creativity and precision to every project.
Working with Anushka has been a pleasure; her coding skills and dedication are top-notch.
